column1: text
What is a really good question to ask someone, that will tell you the most about them?
What was the reason you walked out on a first date with someone?
How do you believe porn has changed how men have sex with you?
What is a flaw in your SO that you can overlook because you love them?
what are examples of small things you've set up in your daily life that make your life smoother, easier, or saves you time/energy?
Ladies with very high sex drive, how do you deal with it if your partner has a low sex drive?

Women of Reddit, what is your “guilty pleasure” when it comes to spending?


Some people collect designer bags, while others might devote their extra money to travel or a particular hobby. 

What is your preferred category?
Those of you with a PhD, what do you do for a living? Are you content with the decision to do a PhD?
If you've ever had a creepy or unexplainable thing happen to you, what was it?
What do you get tired of having to explain to men?

What do you like in both its cheap/mediocre form and its expensive/exquisite form?


For example, you equally like scotch aged 6 years and scotch aged 18 years.
Busty woman of Reddit, what are the daily struggles you encounter because of your boobs?

Women who work in a business casual environment, what are your favorite work outfits?


I'm starting grad school this fall in a clinical setting and I'd love inspiration. Bonus points for shoes you can stand all day in.
What weird things do you do with your pets?
What is your S/O like?
Ladies, what do you think is the biggest style mistake a man can make?
Travelers of AskWomen, where do you NEVER want to go again?
What is something that you secretly like in spite of your better judgment?

How soon did you move in with your S/O?


How soon did you move in with your S/O? Was it a good idea or a mistake?
